name: Boreal Wolf's Broken Fang
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. Thehonorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.  In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two greathumans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal - that wordmeaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.
